tvdb: Kevin doesn't believe Lucy heard Christina on the telephone.  They search together, but don't find her, but, once alone, Lucy sees Christina.  Alison feels jealous seeing Jamal with Valerie, who gives him Hope's picture.  Finding the pic, Ali wonders if Jamal's the father.  When Daniel's missing, Ian calls the police as Livvie hides in the bushes with Daniel, then slips away and takes him to Ian's hotel room.  Eve awaits a kidnapper's call but instead receives a warning about Ian.  Ian returns to his room to find Danny, just as Eve arrives.  When 2 plane tickets are delivered, Eve accuses Ian of trying to kidnap their baby.
